statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{7.49}; top has length \displaystyle{11.33}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{7.54} and \displaystyle{8.94}. The height is \displaystyle{7.46}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{11.33}+{8.94}+{7.49}+{7.54}={35.3}.
